tweet.text: The #Chinese produced 1.7 million bicycles per year at the Forever factory in Shanghai and was an example of the strengths and weaknesses of their modernization efforts. https://t.co/gJKRpLjmEb #BikeToWork #BTWD2018 #FRUS https://t.co/MV3BK5w7Qx
